The term "long alkyl side chain" can be considered a descriptor of the material rather than a property itself, as it does not directly refer to a measurable or quantifiable aspect of the material. Therefore, it is not included in the table. Similarly, the term "give rise to" can be considered a verb and does not refer to a material property.
